plants.name: Rose
plants.description: The rose is a classic flower known for its beauty and fragrance.

plants.name: Sunflower
plants.description: The sunflower is a tall, bright flower that follows the sun.

plants.name: Orchid
plants.description: Orchids are elegant flowers known for their vibrant colors and delicate petals.

plants.name: Tulip
plants.description: Tulips are popular spring flowers with a wide range of colors and shapes.

plants.name: Lavender
plants.description: Lavender is a fragrant herb often used in aromatherapy and cooking.
